    • CreateProject

      public void CreateProject(String nameP, String nameC, Calendar start, double budget, String nameGreen, String phoneGreen, String nameClient, String phoneClient, int[] eachStageDuration)
      allows to add a new project
      Parameters:
      nameP - Name proyect.
      nameC - Name of client.
      start - Start date of the project.
      budget - Budget of the project.
      nameGreen - Name of employee in charge to negotiate with the client.
      phoneGreen - phone number of employee in charge.
      nameClient - Name of client in charge to negotiate.
      phoneClient - phone number of client in charge to negotiate.
      eachStageDuration - Duraci√≥n de cada una de las etapas del proyecto.

    • registerCapsule

      public void registerCapsule(int index, String situation, int type, String nameCreator, String positionCreator, String lesson, ArrayList<String> keywords)
      Registers a capsule in the given project
      Parameters:
      index - index of the selected project
      situation - String that represents the situation
      type - int that represents the type of the capsule
      nameCreator - name of the creator of the capsule
      positionCreator - The position of the creator of the capsule.
      lesson - the lesson that creator got.
      keywords - The keywords which represents the most important topics of the capsule.

    • findCapsule

      public String findCapsule()
      search the first capsule that wasn't checked yet
      Returns:
      The text of the capsule or "" if it was not found

    • acceptCapsule

      public void acceptCapsule(int decision)
      accepts the first capsule that is not checked
      Parameters:
      decision - int that represents the decision of accepting a capsule

    • amountCapsulesPerType

      public int amountCapsulesPerType(int type)
      get the quantity of capsules per type
      Parameters:
      type - int that represents the type searched, 1. tecnico, 2. gestion, 3. dominio, 4. experiencias and 5. any type
      Returns:
      the quantity of that type of capsules

    • getMadeCapsulesOfStage

      public int getMadeCapsulesOfStage(int indexProject, int stageSelected)
      get the quantity of made capsules of a given stage
      Parameters:
      indexProject - index of the selected project
      stageSelected - index of the stage in the project
      Returns:
      the quantity of capsules made in that project and stage

      stage - index of the stage in the project
      Returns:

    • showIfWorkerCreatedCapsule

      public String showIfWorkerCreatedCapsule(int index, String name)
      shows if a user with the given name wrote a capsule in that project
      Parameters:
      index - index of the selected project
      name - name of the worker
      Returns:
      an String showing if the worker made or did not made a capsule

    • searchWord

      public ArrayList<String> searchWord(String word)
      gets an ArrayList of capsules by a given keyword
      Parameters:
      word - keyword that has to be in the ArrayList of capsules
      Returns:
      a ArrayList of strings representing the found capsules
